Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On September 27, 2024, JPMorgan Chase & Co. (the “Company”) filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a prospectus supplement dated September 27, 2024 (the “Prospectus Supplement”) related to the JPMorgan Chase & Co. Dividend Reinvestment Plan (the “Plan”). In connection with the filing of the Prospectus Supplement, Morgan, Lewis & Bockius LLP delivered a legality opinion, a copy of which is attached hereto as Exhibit 5.1, with respect to the shares of common stock, par value $1.00 per share, of the Company that may be offered and sold from time to time under the Plan.
